para.text: Receive and administer grants, as necessary, to provide services to assist individuals with disabilities in achieving or maintaining gainful employment; and
Enter into contracts or other agreements, as necessary, to provide services or support to assist individuals with disabilities in achieving or maintaining gainful employment.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 5002 of Fiscal Year 2008 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2007 (D.C. Act 17-74, July 25, 2007, 54 DCR 7549).
Short title: Section 5001 of D.C. Law 17-20 provided that subtitle A of title V of the act may be cited as the “Rehabilitation Services Program Amendment Act of 2007”.
